name: discogs_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Discogs in parallel.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('#search_results .card, .search_result_card, [data-object-type]').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const titleEl = el.querySelector('a.search_result_title, h4 a, .card-title a'); const subtitleEl = el.querySelector('.card-subtitle, .search_result_subtitle, span'); results.push({ title: titleEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: titleEl?.href || '', subtitle: subtitleEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: decodeURIComponent(params.get('q') || ''), result_count: results.length, results };
detailSteps.name: results
